javadoc: Class with static methods formatting values in hex.

methods.name: hexByteString
methods.comment: Gets a hexadecimal representation of a byte value.

return.comment: the byte as a hexadecimal string.

methods.name: hexWordString
methods.comment: Gets a hexadecimal representation of a short value.

return.comment: the short as a hexadecimal string.

methods.name: padIt
methods.comment:
Creates a string prepended with zeros, if padding is indicated, and adds 
 the indicated endchar as the suffix.

params.name: padlen
params.comment: length of the padded string without the suffix character.

params.name: padded
params.comment: if true then prepend with zeros

return.comment: return the possibly padded string containing the suffix.

name: StringFormat
comment: Class with static methods formatting values in hex.
